item.title: Chain Games Partners with Centralex Announcing Token Listing and Airdrop of CENX Tokens to Existing CHAIN Stakers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Tallinn, Estonia– (Chain Games OU. â€“ May 14th, 2021) – Â Chain Games, OU, a blockchain gaming and Esports company, is pleased to announce a partnership with Centralex Exchange, resulting in a token listing of the Companyâ€™s CHAIN gaming token, as well as an airdrop of CENX tokens to all existing CHAIN stakers.Â Â Â  With the Centralex […]

The post Chain Games Partners with Centralex Announcing Token Listing and Airdrop of CENX Tokens to Existing CHAIN Stakers first appeared on Chain Games.
item.content:encoded:
Tallinn, Estonia– (Chain Games OU. â€“ May 14th, 2021) – Â Chain Games, OU, a blockchain gaming and Esports company, is pleased to announce a partnership with Centralex Exchange, resulting in a token listing of the Companyâ€™s CHAIN gaming token, as well as an airdrop of CENX tokens to all existing CHAIN stakers.Â Â Â 

With the Centralex partnership, Chain Gamesâ€™ players will be able to conveniently exchange fiat and crypto for CHAIN tokens for the purposes of playing games, thereby expanding the Companyâ€™s crypto and fiat footprint. Players will be able to buy and sell CHAIN tokens directly on the Centralex exchange platform using crypto, bank transfers or bank cards, and with on-ramp methods including Visa, Mastercard, SEPA and more. The partnership improves the accessibility of crypto to savvy and novice players helping accelerate wider adoption of Chain Gamesâ€™ online Esports platform.

In addition to the Centralex listing, all current CHAIN stakers as of May 17th, 11:59:59PM UTC, will receive a weighted airdrop of CENX tokens equivalent to 2% of the total CENX supply.Â  The date of the airdrop will commence one week after the listing of the CHAIN token on the Centralex Exchange platform.

Chain Gamesâ€™ CEO, Adam Barlam explains that “One of the biggest user pain points in blockchain gaming and crypto in general, is buying CHAIN tokens or any tokens with fiat or crypto, and Centralex helps reduce the barriers for global competitive gamers.Â  Crypto and fiat on and off-ramps will play an important role in the scaling and adoption of our gaming platform, and the partnership with Centralex will help us to generate broader access to various players with differing familiarity with crypto.â€

Centralex CEO, Tristan Roozendaal explains that “We at Centralex have a very strong foundation of ex-bankers and crypto fanatics. Centralex is a fully regulated Estonian exchange, and uses the latest wallet technologies to safeguard clients’ funds via â€œFireBlocksâ€, our wallet service provider offering Custo-DeFi solutions.Â  We are excited to extend this functionality to the Chain Games community and new and existing token holders and gamers!”Â 

About Centralex

Centralex is an international fully regulated Estonian cryptocurrency exchange . With a global vision in mind and an international office footprint spanning two continents, Centralex strives to bring remarkable people together to do extraordinary things.

To contact Centralex:
Website: https://centralex.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CentraleX_hk
Telegram: https://t.me/centralexhk
Email: media@centralex.io

About Chain Games

Chain Games is a blockchain enabled gaming platform designed to allow competitive Esports competitions on a non-custodial, decentralized platform governed by an Ethereum Smart Contract.Â Â 

To contact Chain Games:
Website: ./../index.html
Twitter: https://twitter.com/realchaingames
Telegram: https://t.me/chaingames
Email: brian@chaingames.io

The post Chain Games Partners with Centralex Announcing Token Listing and Airdrop of CENX Tokens to Existing CHAIN Stakers first appeared on Chain Games.

item.title: Chain Games Partners with Transak to Power Fiat-Crypto Blockchain Gaming GatewayÂ
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Tallinn, Estonia and Boulder, Colorado–(Chain Games OU â€“ May 10th, 2021) – Â Chain Games, OU, a blockchain gaming and Esports company, is pleased to announce that the Company has partnered with Transak to power its gaming platform. With the Transak partnership, Chain Gamesâ€™ players will be able to conveniently use fiat to purchase CHAIN tokens […]

The post Chain Games Partners with Transak to Power Fiat-Crypto Blockchain Gaming GatewayÂ  first appeared on Chain Games.
item.content:encoded:
Tallinn, Estonia and Boulder, Colorado–(Chain Games OU â€“ May 10th, 2021) – Â Chain Games, OU, a blockchain gaming and Esports company, is pleased to announce that the Company has partnered with Transak to power its gaming platform.

With the Transak partnership, Chain Gamesâ€™ players will be able to conveniently use fiat to purchase CHAIN tokens for the purposes of playing games thereby expanding the Companyâ€™s crypto footprint in more than 60 countries worldwide. Players will be able to buy CHAIN tokens directly using a bank transfer or bank card with payment methods including Visa, Mastercard, SEPA and more. The partnership improves the accessibility of crypto to savvy and novice players helping accelerate wider adoption of Chain Gamesâ€™ online Esports platform.

Chain Gamesâ€™ CEO, Adam Barlam explains that “one of the biggest user pain points in blockchain gaming and crypto in general, is buying CHAIN tokens or any tokens with fiat, and Transak helps reduce the barriers for global competitive gamers.Â  Fiat on-ramps will play an important role in the scaling and adoption of our gaming platform and the partnership with Transak will help us to generate broader access to various players with differing familiarity with crypto.â€

Transak CEO, Sami Start explains that “Transak is on a mission to make it easier to connect money and data to your blockchain wallet. We believe that the blockchain wallet will become a single sign-on for finance. Kind of like sign in with Google or Facebook, but with way more features. We are very pleased to partner with Chain Games to help grow the adoption of the Chain Games platform.”Â 

About Transak

Transak is a single integration for applications to accept fiat-to-crypto deposits and withdrawals from a global user base. It does this by aggregating fiat on-ramps from around the world and abstracting away the complexity of local compliance, payment methods, and operations. Transak is backed by Consensys. For more information, please visit https://transak.com/.Â 

About Chain Games

Chain Games is a blockchain enabled gaming platform designed to allow competitive Esports competitions on a non-custodial, decentralized platform governed by an Ethereum Smart Contract.Â Â 

To contact Chain Games:
Website: ./../index.html
Twitter: https://twitter.com/realchaingames
Telegram: https://t.me/chaingames
Email: brian@chaingames.io

 

The post Chain Games Partners with Transak to Power Fiat-Crypto Blockchain Gaming GatewayÂ  first appeared on Chain Games.

item.title: Chain Games First 40 Days Recap: A Message from the CEO
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Hey Chain Gang!Â  For only being around for just under 40 days, we have made incredible strides in such a short period of time! August 24th marked the launch of our first fully working product and proof of concept use case Super Crypto Kart for Windows, Mac OS and Linux.Â  We had great feedback and […]

The post Chain Games First 40 Days Recap: A Message from the CEO first appeared on Chain Games.
item.content:encoded:
Hey Chain Gang!Â  For only being around for just under 40 days, we have made incredible strides in such a short period of time!

August 24th marked the launch of our first fully working product and proof of concept use case Super Crypto Kart for Windows, Mac OS and Linux.Â  We had great feedback and users really loved the concept and game with hundreds of downloads just on Day 1!

On August 26th we launched our much anticipated ILO on Uniswap and were the 3rd most traded token on the DEX beating out several stable coins and trading nearly 20M USD in volume!Â  Quite the feat for a new token!

Layer 1 multiplayer launched shortly thereafter amidst the DeFi craze of August and early September.Â  We quickly realized that with the escalating GAS fees on the Ethereum network that we needed to take action and FAST!

We started working on a Layer 2 solution on the MATIC network on September 16th, and just 7 days later had a fully working version of Super Crypto Kart and ported the Chain Games network to be able to run on MATIC testnet.Â 

One day after our testnet launch on September 24th, we released the full version of multiplayer on Layer 2 MATIC mainnet!Â  We had amazing execution and commitment from our dev team and support from all members of the community to push out this full stack solution in such record time!Â  8 days is truly an incredible timeframe to complete such a task, especially in the crypto world.Â 

With Layer 2 running optimally, we were able to reduce GAS fees to next to nothing, while significantly increasing game speed, contract execution time, and improving UX.

On September 27th we announced our intention to implement Call of Duty: Modern Warfare where users can compete on Battle Royale style matches and multiplayer battles for most points, kills, wins, and more to win $CHAIN!Â  In addition we are researching other Tier 1 games where we can execute this same method.

October 2nd marked the news of a MASSIVE strategic partnership with one of the worldâ€™s most iconic consumer brands and interactive entertainment producers, ATARI.Â  ATARI will be integrating the $CHAIN token into their soon to be launched ATARI Crypto-casino, and Chain Games will be implementing the ATRI token into the CHAIN ecosystem.Â  Furthermore, ATARI CEO Fred Chesnais has accepted an advisory role on the Chain Games board!Â  This partnership closely aligns both companies continued interests in blockchain, crypto and the video game industry moving forward.

On October 4th we released the much anticipated Super Crypto Kart for Android with full single player and online multiplayer modes enabled!Â  This enables cross-platform play across Windows, Mac OS, Linux and now Android!Â  iOS is next!

October 5th we announced that our Call of Duty: Modern Warfare implementation will be completed and launched towards the end of November.Â  Not only that, but we have also started working on adding top tier games Fortnite, Madden 21, FIFA 21 and Fall Guys to the list of playable games to compete on in the Chain Games network!Â  The competition is going to get fierce, and so are the $CHAIN payouts for winners!

It has been a very productive 40 days Chain Gang, and we anticipate the next 40 days to be just as productive as we go full steam into releasing high profile games to play on the Chain network.Â  We feel these new tier 1 games will really draw in the audience we need and expect to continue down the path of blockchain gaming excellence!


Until next time,

Adam Barlam
CEO / Founder Chain GamesÂ 

The post Chain Games First 40 Days Recap: A Message from the CEO first appeared on Chain Games.

item.title: AtariÂ® Teams Up with Chain Games to Integrate Atari Token Into Chain Games Ecosystem
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Atari CEO Frederic Chesnais to Serve as Advisor for Chain Games as Companies Integrate One Anotherâ€™s Cryptocurrencies into Their Respective Interactive Entertainment Offerings Both Groups also did proceed with a Token Swap, subject to lockup   New York, NY (October 2nd, 2020) â€“Â  AtariÂ® â€” one of the worldâ€™s most iconic consumer brands and entertainment […]

The post AtariÂ® Teams Up with Chain Games to Integrate Atari Token Into Chain Games Ecosystem first appeared on Chain Games.
item.content:encoded:
Atari CEO Frederic Chesnais to Serve as Advisor for Chain Games as Companies Integrate One Anotherâ€™s Cryptocurrencies into Their Respective Interactive Entertainment Offerings

Both Groups also did proceed with a Token Swap, subject to lockup

 

New York, NY (October 2nd, 2020) â€“Â  AtariÂ® â€” one of the worldâ€™s most iconic consumer brands and entertainment producers â€” today announced a partnership with gaming ecosystem, Chain Games. The terms of the collaboration include the integration of the Atari Token (ATRI) as a support cryptocurrency in Chain Gamesâ€™ first-party blockchain-based titles â€” starting with Super Crypto Kart â€” as well as Chainâ€™s upcoming marketplace and fantasy sports platform. Atari will additionally support the CHAIN Token ($CHAIN) across its library of future Atari Crypto Casino titles.Â 

Chain Games(chaingames.io) is an evolution in Web 3.0 blockchain gaming, combining smart contract-based contests with state of the art gameplay. Committed to transitioning the blockchain gaming industry into the modern gaming era, the Chain Gamesâ€™s ecosystem fits into three core categories: the development of first-party proprietary games featuring live multiplayer and crypto payouts; an open Chain dApp Game Store where developers can integrate Chain Gamesâ€™ SmartContests system into their games; and collaboration with established game studios to integrate Chain Gamesâ€™ systems and CHAIN Token into their titles.

Chain Gamesâ€™ products are fully ERC-20 and Ethereum compatible. SmartContests is an industry first contract-based competition system where players can compete in games of skill to earn winnings. SmartStaking Gaming Contracts reward stakers on the network with 15% of the fees generated on each game played, allowing them to passively earn on any game played on the Chain network. Super Crypto Kart is the first blockchain-integrated game to utilize the Chain Games SmartContests Gaming Contracts. Super Crypto Kart is a cross platform kart-based racing game that is currently available on Windows, Mac OS, Linux, and soon to be released on Android, and iOS.

Both companies have swapped tokens for the equivalent of $200,000, subject to a 6-month lockup.

â€œWe are pleased to announce today a strategic partnership with Chain Games, a true pioneer in blockchain-based gaming,â€ said Fred Chesnais, CEO of Atari. â€œThe technologies which power the Chain Games network create exciting and new possibilities for developers and users, ensuring secure transitions, financial versatility, and additional sources of revenue not just for game makers â€” but also for players interested in raising the stakes of competitive multiplayer experiences.â€

â€œAtari is one of the most recognized consumer brands in the video game and entertainment space and we are ecstatic to be part of the Atari family,â€ said Adam Barlam, CEO & Founder of Chain Games.

Atari Chain CEO FrÃ©dÃ©ric Chesnais will also advise the Chain Games Board of Directors.

Atari Chain Ltd. is a subsidiary of Atari SA, created to lead the development of ongoing projects in the field of cryptocurrencies in entertainment-based industries. The Atari Token, currently slated to be listed in November of 2020, is issued by Atari Chain, Ltd (Gibraltar), a company equally owned by Atari and the ICICB Group.

For more information on Atari Chain, please join the Atari Telegram at https://t.me/AtariTokenOfficial and visit atarichain.com.

To stay up-to-date on all things Atari and retro-pop-culture, follow on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.


About AtariÂ 

AtariÂ® is an interactive entertainment company. As an iconic brand that transcends generations and audiences, the company is globally recognized for its multi-platform, interactive entertainment, and licensed products. Atari owns and/or manages a portfolio of more than 200 games and franchises, including world-renowned brands like AsteroidsÂ®, CentipedeÂ®, Missile CommandÂ®, PongÂ®, and RollerCoaster TycoonÂ®. Atari has offices in New York and Paris. Visit us online at www.atari.com.


About Chain Games

Chain Gamesis an evolution in Web 3.0 blockchain gaming combining smart contract based contests with state of the art gameplay.Â  Chain Games is committed to transitioning the blockchain gaming industry into the modern gaming era. Chain Games is an Estonian Private Limited Liability Company.

For more information on Chain Games, please join the Chain Games Telegram at https://t.me/chaingames and visit ./../index.html.

To stay up-to-date on all things Chain Games, follow on Twitter and Facebook.

 

###

Press Contacts:

Â 

For Atari:
UberStrategist Inc.
Mario R. Kroll and CJ Melendez
pr@uberstrategist.com
646-844-8388


For Chain Games:
Chain Games OUÌˆ
Sundeep S.
outreach@chaingames.io

 

The post AtariÂ® Teams Up with Chain Games to Integrate Atari Token Into Chain Games Ecosystem first appeared on Chain Games.

item.title: How to Play on MATIC Mainnet
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
We are proud to announce we have collaborated & integrated with Layer 2 provider MATIC network to enable SUPER FAST and SUPER CHEAP Ethereum transactions for all games on the Chain Games decentralized gaming ecosystem providing a superior UX for all users! We are LIVE on mainnet right now with the MATIC solution and here […]

The post How to Play on MATIC Mainnet first appeared on Chain Games.
item.content:encoded:
We are proud to announce we have collaborated & integrated with Layer 2 provider MATIC network to enable SUPER FAST and SUPER CHEAP Ethereum transactions for all games on the Chain Games decentralized gaming ecosystem providing a superior UX for all users!

We are LIVE on mainnet right now with the MATIC solution and here at @RealChainGames we like to under promise and over deliver!Â  Thatâ€™s why we are bringing you the full mainnet implementation of this solution a full day early instead of our original plan of Sept 25th!

It’s super easy to get started to play on mainnet!

 

How to Play on MATIC Mainnet:

 

Step 1: You will need some $ETH for gas fees and $CHAIN tokens to play.

BUY $CHAIN from your favorite exchange:

Uniswap – https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?outputCurrency=0xC4C2614E694cF534D407Ee49F8E44D125E4681c4
ProBit – https://www.probit.com/app/exchange/CHAIN-USDT
Bilaxy – https://bilaxy.com/trade/CHAIN_ETH
Multi.io – https://multi.io/en/trading/exchange/CHAINUSDT

 

Step 2: Fund your gaming session – https://wallet.chaingames.io/

We recommend allocating quite a bit so you have enough for future gaming sessions as well and can avoid paying additional ETH gas fees. This is the longest part of the process as it will transfer the tokens from ETH Layer 1 to MATIC Layer 2. It can take up to 5 minutes to complete. We are working on an instant cross-chain function to make this process MUCH quicker, but for now, just wait patiently

 

Step 3: Download and install Super Crypto Kart for your desired platform:

Windows – https://d3op4twapqdg5r.cloudfront.net/SuperCryptoKart-v2.2.0-installer-64bit.exe
Mac OS – https://d3op4twapqdg5r.cloudfront.net/SuperCryptoKart-v2.2.0.dmg
Linux – https://d3op4twapqdg5r.cloudfront.net/SuperCryptoKart-v2.2.0.tar.gz
Android – https://d3op4twapqdg5r.cloudfront.net/SuperCryptoKart-v2.2.apk

 

Step 4: Start Super Crypto Kart and create a new username, or use your existing username if you played previous releases.

Once logged in, select “Online” icon on home screen, and then select “Your Profile” icon.Â  Ensure your wallet address and approved $CHAIN amount are listed.

 

 

 

Make sure you turn your graphics to max!Â  Options -> Graphics

Change:Â  Graphical Effects Level -> 6

Change:Â  Blur Effects Level -> 2

 

Congratulations!Â  You are now ready to play online!

For additional questions/help please join us on Discord or Telegram.

The post How to Play on MATIC Mainnet first appeared on Chain Games.

item.title: How to Play on MATIC Testnet
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
We are proud to announce we have collaborated & integrated with Layer 2 provider MATIC network to enable SUPER FAST and SUPER CHEAP Ethereum transactions for all games on the Chain Games decentralized gaming ecosystem providing a superior UX for all users! We are LIVE on testnet right now with the MATIC solution and here […]

The post How to Play on MATIC Testnet first appeared on Chain Games.
item.content:encoded:
We are proud to announce we have collaborated & integrated with Layer 2 provider MATIC network to enable SUPER FAST and SUPER CHEAP Ethereum transactions for all games on the Chain Games decentralized gaming ecosystem providing a superior UX for all users!

We are LIVE on testnet right now with the MATIC solution and here at @RealChainGames we like to under promise and over deliver!Â  Thatâ€™s why we are bringing you the full mainnet implementation of this solution a full day early and will be releasing it tomorrow Sept 24th instead of our original plan of Sept 25th!

It’s super easy to get started to play on testnet until mainnet is released tomorrow.

How to Setup Your Environment for MATIC Testnet Play:

Step 1: You will next need some testnet $ETH and testnet $CHAIN.Â  Make sure you switch your Metamask to “Goerli Test Network“.

Testnet $ETH – https://goerli-faucet.slock.it/ or from https://faucet.goerli.mudit.blog/

Testnet $CHAIN – https://faucet.chaingames.io/

Step 2: Fund your gaming session – https://wallet-testnet.chaingames.io/

Step 3: Download and install Super Crypto Kart for your desired platform:

Windows â€“Â https://d3op4twapqdg5r.cloudfront.net/SuperCryptoKart-v2.2.0-installer-64bit.exe
Mac OS â€“Â https://d3op4twapqdg5r.cloudfront.net/SuperCryptoKart-v2.2.0.dmg
Linux â€“Â https://d3op4twapqdg5r.cloudfront.net/SuperCryptoKart-v2.2.0.tar.gz
Android â€“Â https://d3op4twapqdg5r.cloudfront.net/SuperCryptoKart-v2.2.apk

Step 4:Â  Startup Super Crypto Kart and change to testnet option in Options->General

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Step 5:Â  Restart Super Crypto Kart and create a new username, or use your existing username if you played previous releases.

Congratulations!Â  You are now ready to play online!

We recommend you also up the graphics and blur levels to max in Options->Graphics.Â Â 

The post How to Play on MATIC Testnet first appeared on Chain Games.
